short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a tab on hub.docker.com to display useful tags (grouped by digest)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UsefulDockerTags adds a new tab to the Docker Hub repository pages. Clicking on the tab displays a table with the most relevant tags for the image, organized by their digest. You can view which tag correspond to the same image, without having to navigate through the Docker Hub web interface.
